description: This kale and coconut basmati rice makes an interesting accompliment to any curry.
name: Kale & Coconut Basmati Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g basmati rice, cooked as per pack instructions

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the basmati rice until the water becomes clear and then allow to rest in water. Cook the rice as per pack instructions which should take 20 minutes.
Fry up the coconut oil with the mustard and cumin seeds for 2 minutes or until the seeds begin to pop.
Then add the kale to the pan and fry for a further 2 minutes. Add the rice to the pan, fry for a further 3 minutes before serving.
